name: Gate of Glory
description:
A game entry for Pocket Jam #4 at Pocket Gamer Connects Helsinki. #PGCHelsinki by Team 7

Guide Berry on their journey to become the legendary golden poo! Tilt things around and make sure Berry finds their way through. Make sure you're headed the right way!  And be sure to collect those Enzymes for healthy digestion.

Currently, download the .apk file and install it on your Android device and you're good to go! 

The shittiest game ever!

Credits: 

- Sergei Dragunov - Art
- Yukyeong Kim - Programming
- Kim Ordén - Programming x2!
- Aleksandr Gurjev  - Sound
- Hassan Fajri  - Design (It me~)
